name: InsideEightPlanks
description:
Made in 1 week during SSJ Horror GMJAM !! ♥ as Brazilian developer was cool participating in this game jam. any bug report please contact me on twitter(@nrc_br) or in comments section below! 

Gameplay: 

• use mouse to move Camera  

• Left Button = Select  

• Right Button = Back

• keyboard shortcuts : [ Q ] [ W ] [ E ] to make choices.

good lucky, remember: Time is limited.
